title: Izakaya Fuji
overview: Eiichi Nishio is an aspiring young actor, who is not well-known yet and only receives roles to play dead bodies. While wandering around Nakameguro, Tokyo, he recognizes the restaurant/bar Izakaya Fuji, which he had seen pictures of it on a woman's Instagram account. Curious, he decides to go in, whereupon he meets Nao Omori and other actors - all regulars of the establishment.Â
